body:
* Updated dependencies including electron@11.2.0
* [mac] Universal binary that runs natively on both Intel and Apple Silicon
* [windows] Drop 32-bit support
* [linux] Remove --no-sandbox launch args
 * Various performance and security improvements

* Updated dependencies including electron@8.2.5
* [mac] Add touchbar support for pinned channels and the channel switcher
* Various performance and security improvements

* Updated dependencies including electron@8.0.2
* Fixed mouse back/forward buttons reloading the page
* Various performance and security improvements

* Updated dependencies including electron@8.0.1
* Various performance and security improvements

* Updated dependencies including electron@5.0.7
* Various performance and security improvements
* [mac] Fixed code signing issue that broke spell checking
* [linux] Added an edge channel snap build https://snapcraft.io/irccloud

* Updated dependencies including electron@5.0.6
* Various performance and security improvements

* Updated dependencies including electron@5.0.1
* Various performance and security improvements
* [win] The app is signed with a new certificate on Windows which may result in a security prompt on first run
* Updated dependencies including electron@4.1.4

* Updated dependencies including electron@4.0.4
* [mac] Enable macOS Mojave dark mode

name: v0.8.0
body:
* Updated dependencies including electron@3.0.6
* Improve context menu options for copying and downloading links

name: v0.7.2
body: * Updated dependencies including a fix for a crash on macOS Yosemite

name: v0.7.1
body: * Updated dependencies including a fix for AppImage linux builds (#121)

name: v0.7.0
body:
* Updated dependencies including electron@2.0.2
* [mac] Prompt to move to Applications folder on launch
* [win/linux] Improve support for handling irc:// links

name: v0.6.0
body: * Updated dependencies including electron@1.7.11

name: v0.5.1
body: * Fixed various auto update issues

name: v0.5.0
body:
* Auth dialogs (e.g. PayPal) can now open in app
* (Windows) Fixed copying link addresses to clipboard
* Stability improvements and minor fixes

* Updated to the latest version of electron.
* Zooming in and out is now more finely grained, the actual size keyboard shortcut no longer conflict with the main window shortcut, and the interaction with incremental and pinch zooming has been improved.
* Maximise and full screen are now separate options, and they're now remembered properly between restarts.
* Added a menu item for opening the config file in an editor.
* Added user script and style support via the config file `userScriptPath` and `userStylePath` options. You will be prompted whether to trust these files when they're first detected and they can be disabled with the `acceptUserScripts` and `acceptUserStyles` config options.
* Added a menu item to reveal the log file.
* Improve filenames for downloads triggered with alt/option-click.
* Fixed duplicate separators in context menus.
* Added a cmd/ctrl-t shortcut to open a new browser tab.
* Added automatic crash reporting via sentry.io
* (Windows) Added 32 bit builds.
* (Linux) Added categories to the desktop file and fixed various icon issues.

- Feature: Alt-clicking on a link or "Save as" context menu item will download an image or link immediately
- Feature: Copy image context menu
- Feature: (macOS) Don't quit the app when closing the window #56
- Fix: (Linux) Don't show broken and unsupported "Set as Default IRC client" dialog
- Fix: (Linux) Working AppImage package #55

- Feature: Prompt to set as default IRC client
- Feature: Remember window position #48 
- Feature: Added a menu option to disable spellcheck while typing #47 
- Feature: (Linux) Now available in [AppImage](http://appimage.org/) format
- Fix: Make sure streamlined login page is still used after logging out, or session invalidation
- Fix: (macOS) Remove icon from DMG #43

- Fix Windows build
- Fix error on window resize in Windows (#42)

- Fixes icon on Linux (#34)
- Save maximised state (#39)
- Added an option to enabled menu bar autohiding on Windows and Linux (#37)
- Added page zoom (#20)
- Automatic updates (#8)
- Windows builds are now code signed.

_NOTE_ Windows build was broken, the binaries have been removed.

name: v0.1.7
body:
- Update electron to v0.37.8
- Mac: 3-finger swipe forward/back navigation
- Improved, simpler login screen
- Windows/Linux: Added a tray icon option
- Context menu item to open links in browser
- Middle click, or hold Cmd (Mac) or Ctrl (Win/Linux) while clicking links to open them in the background
- Fix non-clickable menu items

- Small spellcheck tweaks
- Update Electron to 0.37
- Now built for Linux as well (currently untested)
- Mac builds are now code-signed
- 32-bit Windows builds are gone. I don't know why, presumably because we updated electron-builder. They might come back, if people need them.
- Lots more menu items

- Right/ctrl click context menu for copying and navigation
- Fix file/app/window menus
- Change Github link to point to Known Issues

- Support forward/back mouse buttons on Windows
- Remove inert About menu option

- Exceedingly provisional Windows builds
- Menu updates, forward/back shortcuts.

- Display mixed-content user images
- Input box context menus
- Spellchecking support
